messages.subject: Response to digest 793
messages.msgSnippet: Hi folks, Thanks for all the info on homeschooling and politics, this will be our discussion topic in Oct. at our meeting. I was sewing and designing Barbie
messages.messageBody:
Hi folks,

Thanks for all the info on homeschooling and politics, this will be our
discussion topic in Oct. at our meeting.

I was sewing and designing Barbie clothes when I was ten. I used a old
treddle machine, no electric power all,
foot control. My son has been sewing with me for a while using the
electic machine. Mostly he just pushes the
peddle and pretends he's driving a car. He has also sewn a little bag
for himself. He's now 6, he probably sewed
that bag when he was 4 with my hands guiding with the fabric through the
machine. He'll be helping with
Christmas presents this year.

Sherry
